name: Cosmonoid
description:
Cosmonoid

Explore space, grab fuel, warp further!

A Ludum Dare 48 Jam entry

Change Log:

[2021-04-27] v1.0.1:
* The "Invert Y-axis" button ("I") is now working, whereas before it was shared with "Restart to Intro" and wasn't workable. This and other additional controls are listed in the Menu -> Controls page (and were in v1.0.0 as well).

[2021-04-26] v1.0.0: Initial Release
